alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Garfield County through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Rifle, or 35 miles west of Glenwood Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Garfield County, including the following locations... Rio Blanco. This includes Colorado 13 between mile markers 11 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus
